4thLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Aura of Life
4thLevelPaladinSpells.Description: A life-affirming energy surrounds you, protecting your allies. Each non-hostile creature in the aura gains resistance to necrotic damage and cannot have its hit points reduced below 1.

4thLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Aura of Purity
4thLevelPaladinSpells.Description: The air shimmers with holy energy in a 30-foot radius around you. Affected creatures have advantage on saving throws against disease, poison, and the frightened condition.

4thLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Aura of the Guardian
4thLevelPaladinSpells.Description: When a creature within 10 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to magically take that damage instead.

4thLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Banishment
4thLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.

4thLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Death Ward
4thLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death. The first time the target would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead drops to 1 hit point and the spell ends.
